django.contrib.sites.requests
=============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.sites.requests


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.sites.requests.RequestSite


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: RequestSite(request)

   A class that shares the primary interface of Site (i.e., it has ``domain``
   and ``name`` attributes) but gets its data from an HttpRequest object
   rather than from a database.

   The save() and delete() methods raise NotImplementedError.


   .. py:method:: save(force_insert=False, force_update=False)
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:method:: delete()
      :abstractmethod:
